platform.title: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
platform.summary: Set up you own general purpose genomics server runing AWS using GVL and CloudMan.
comments: Using [CloudLaunch](https://launch.usegalaxy.org/) you can set up your own dynamically scalable Galaxy Server in less than 10 minutes.
You need to have an account on AWS and have a credit card associated with that account.
This is based on GVL, CloudBridge, and CloudMan infrastructure.
